page.title: 10Clubs,Abermorddu & Area
page.content: {Abermorddu Guides The group meets from 7pm till 9pm on Mondays at Abermorddu School. The guider,Mrs.Thomas,and her assistant Miss.Claire Roberts are in charge of about thirty,10 to 16 year old girls split into four patrols called Nightingales,Swallows,Bluetits and Sparrows. The weekly fee is 30p.Activities include games,working for badges and learning cooking.At least once a year the group go to camp. {Caergwrle Wanderers. }Founded in 1976 there are 3 teams(under 10's, 12's,14's)which play in the Wrexham and District League. The teams train and play home matches at Abermorddu School or at Castell Alun Sports Centre.Members pay a weekly fee of 25p and are managed by adults,usually parents.
